About

Documenting my journey in life.

I love problem solving and my other hobbies include mathematics, programming and tinkering with computers.
I am currently a student in Grade-12th and will be giving my A levels and going to university next year.
I have built this website mostly to document the projects which I will be doing, learning new skills, talking about the things which I am interested in and any other thoughts which come to my mind. I will be adding some personal updates here and there and also share the book notes from the book which I am currently reading.
Another reason I built this site is to be free of the centralised social media services everyone uses. The web should not be just two or three mega-corps running their ad machines. With this website I hope to contribute a little bit to making that dream come true.

You can contact me at vinayak@vinayakarora.xyz
